docs.summary:
The wix-billing-backend module contains functionality for working with
 [your site's invoices](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-wix-invoices)
 from backend code.
description: To use the Invoices API, import `{invoices}` from the `wix-billing-backend` module:
```javascript
import {invoices} from 'wix-billing-backend';

params.name: id
params.doc: ID and version of the invoice.

params.name: payment
params.doc: The payment that should be added to the invoice.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the payment is added to the invoice.

docs.summary: Adds a payment to the invoice and reports the payment to the payment provider.
description: The `addPayment()` function returns a Promise that resolves
when the specified payment is added to the invoice with the specified ID.

examples.title: Add a payment to an invoice
body: export function addPayment(id, version, type, amount) {

examples.title: Get the invoice version and add a payment to an invoice

params.name: invoiceFields
params.doc: The data used to create an invoice.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - ID of the created invoice.

docs.summary: Creates a new invoice.
description: The `createInvoice()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the created invoice's
ID when the invoice is created.
> **Note:** The customer ID and email address listed on the invoice must match an existing contact in the site's contact list.

examples.title: Create a new invoice
body: // contact ID and email address must match an
// existing contact in the site's contact list
"addressLine": "235 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA",
"addressLine": "235 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA",

params.name: id
params.doc: Object containing the ID and version of the invoice.

params.name: options
params.doc: An object with the following boolean property: suppressAuth.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - URL of the invoice preview.

docs.summary: Creates a link that can be used by a customer to preview the invoice.
description: The `createInvoicePreviewUrl()` function returns a Promise that resolves
to a temporary link to a preview of the invoice with the specified ID.
You can get a list of invoices by querying your site's
["Billing/Invoices"](https://support.wix.com/en/article/velo-wix-billing-invoices-collection-fields)
collection.
Each invoice in the query result contains the `_id` and `version` fields,
which must be used when calling `createInvoicePreviewUrl()`.
By default, `createInvoicePreviewUrl()` can be called by site contributors only.
To allow customers to generate the invoice preview link,
set `suppressAuth` in the `options` argument to `true`.

examples.title: Get the invoice version and create the invoice preview link
Query invoices and create the invoice preview link for the first result

params.name: id
params.doc: ID of the invoice to delete.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the specified invoice is deleted.

docs.summary: Deletes an invoice by ID.
description: The `deleteInvoice()` function returns a Promise that resolves
when the invoice with the specified ID is deleted.

params.name: id
params.doc: ID of the invoice to get.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The invoice with the given ID.

docs.summary: Gets an existing invoice by ID.
description: The `getInvoice()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the invoice
with the specified ID.

examples.title: Get invoice by ID
body: *       "formatted": "235 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA"
*       "addressLine": "235 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA",
*       "formatted": "235 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA"
*       "addressLine": "235 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA",
*       "formatted": "235 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA"

params.name: id
params.doc: ID and version of the invoice to send.

params.name: emailInfo
params.doc: Information used when sending the email.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the specified invoice is sent.

docs.summary: Sends an invoice preview link to a customer via email.
description: The `sendInvoice()` function returns a Promise that resolves
when the invoice with the specified ID and version is sent to the customer
listed on the invoice.
Use the `emailOptions` parameter to specify the subject and body of the email
sent to the customer.

examples.title: Send an invoice to a customer
body: export function sendInvoiceToCustomer(id, version, subject, body) {

examples.title: Get the invoice version and send the invoice to a customer

params.name: id
params.doc: ID and version of the invoice to update.

params.name: invoiceFields
params.doc: The data used to update the invoice.

params.name: fieldMask
params.doc:
Fields to update in the invoice.
 If not specified, all fields update.

 One of:

 + `"customer"`
 + `"lineItems"`
 + `"number"`
 + `"locale"`
 + `"discount"`
 + `"title"`
 + `"currency"`
 + `"issueDate"`
 + `"dueDate"`
 + `"taxes"`
 + `"totals.total"`
 + `"totals.subtotal"`
 + `"totals.subtotal"`
 + `"totals.fees"`
 + `"metadata.notes"`
 + `"metadata.legalTerms"`
 + `"metadata.sourceUrl"`
 + `"metadata.sourceProperties"`
 + `"metadata.source"`
 + `"metadata.sourceRefId"`

ret.doc: Fulfilled - ID and version of the updated invoice.

docs.summary: Update an existing invoice.
description: The `updateInvoice()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the updated invoice's
ID when the invoice is updated.
> **Note:** The customer listed on the invoice must be an existing site contact or member.

params.name: id
params.doc: ID and version of the invoice to void.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the specified invoice is voided.

docs.summary: Voids an invoice.
description: The `voidInvoice()` function returns a Promise that resolves
when the invoice with the specified ID is voided.
Calling `voidInvoice()` on a draft invoice causes an error.

examples.title: Get the invoice version and void the invoice

members.name: type
members.doc:
Discount type.

Either:

+ `"Fixed"`: A fixed amount is deducted.
+ `"Percentage"`: A percentage of the total amount is deducted.

members.doc:
Email body. Limited formatting in the email body can be
achieved using standard JavaScript string formatting.

docs.summary: An object that represents an invoice.

examples.title: Get invoice by ID
body: *       "formatted": "235 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA"

members.name: id
members.doc: ID and version of the invoice.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the invoice.
 One of:

 + `"Draft"`
 + `"Sent"`
 + `"Processing"`
 + `"Paid"`
 + `"Overdue"`
 + `"Void"`
 + `"Deleted"`
 + `"PartiallyPaid"`
 + `"PartialAndOverdue"`

members.name: number
members.doc: Number of the invoice, unique within your site.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Line items listed on the invoice.

members.name: payments
members.doc: List of payments already received from the customer.

members.name: taxes
members.doc: List of taxes calculated based on the line items.

members.name: metadata
members.doc: Additional metadata included in the invoice.

members.name: wasSent
members.doc: Whether the invoice was sent to the customer.

members.name: language
members.doc:
An IETF language tag.
Some common language tags include:

+ `"en-US"`: English, United States
+ `"en-GB"`: English, British
+ `"es-ES"`: Spanish, Spain
+ `"de-DE"`: German, Germany
+ `"ja-JP"`: Japanese, Japan
+ `"fr-CH"`: French, Switzerland
+ `"it-IT"`: Italian, Italy

members.name: taxedAmount
members.doc: Sum of line item tax amounts.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of the line items without the tax included.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total price of the itemized fees and taxes.
